attributes.action: ensure that the 2012 olympics in London are carbon neutral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the face of global warming and depletion of our oil reserves, it is immoral to stage such and event if it will contribute significantly to carbon emmissions. In addition to the financial cost of the event, it should also be publicised what the carbon cost would be for: building the venues; hosting the event; and travel for competitors and fans.
